short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annotates full Gregorian dates with Jewish dates in square brackets. Not all dates can be annotated, but we do our best.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wouldn't it be nice to see a Jewish date next to every date on the internet?  Jewish Datify Me does just that!  All you need to do is browse as usual and we will annotate the Jewish date in brackets after each date.
